title: BRIEF-Pernod confident with China, India mid-term growth goals-CFO
text:
BRIEF-Pernod confident with China, India mid-term growth goals-CFO

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 13:24)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pernod confident with China, India mid-term growth goals-CFO Oct 17 (Reuters) - Pernod Ricard : * CFO SAYS GROUP CONFIDENT WITH MID-TERM SALES GROWTH AMBITIONS FOR CHINA AND INDIA * CFO SAYS MID-TERM AMBITION FOR CHINA IS HIGH SINGLE DIGIT TO LOW DOUBLE-DIGIT SALES GROWTH * CFO SAYS SHOULD NOT IMPACT SHORT-TERM IMPROVEMENT IN FRANCE BUSINESS, MID-TERM AMBITION IS TO REGAIN MARKET SHARE * CFO SAYS MID-TERM AMBITION FOR INDIA IS LOW DOUBLE-DIGIT SALES GROWTH AND THIS IS THE TREND FOR THIS FISCAL YEAR

BRIEF-Pernod confident with China, India mid-term growth goals-CFO
description: BRIEF-Pernod confident with China, India mid-term growth goals-CFO
